name: DaisyXMusic
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

API_ID.description: Get the API ID from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Get the API Hash from my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION.description: Get the telethon session from running session.py locally or by running https://replit.com/@ZychoDev/String-Session

ALIVE_PIC.description: Set a custom pic for the alive module

COMMAND_HANDLER.description: Do not remove the slash before the handler.

LOGGER_ID.description: Create a private group add @MissRose_bot , send /id and paste the id here.
